I need someone to help me apply the singapore e-visa.

My passport has multiples entires history to USA,Canada,etc.

Thank you in Advance. 
 
Rdgs,

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
The Education Future Hub (TEFH) is currently looking for highly-motivated enthusiasts to join us as WSQ Diploma Course Consultant. We offer a platform to government approved courses that are subsidized under SkillsFuture Credit (SSG) for Individuals and Corporate level. We also offer a good career path for suitable candidates. 
 
Role: 
To promote a Leadership Development/ People Management Diploma/ Certification Module course subsidized by WDA and SkillsFuture Credit (SSG) to Individuals and Corporate level. 
Completion of course modules will aid Singaporeans to cope with the many changes in the years ahead, make learning and adapting "a lifelong endeavour". This is in line with the Singapore Government's initiative to encourage lifelong learning, increase productivity and to boost employability for employees. 
Join our team of WSQ Leadership Course Consultants and spread the vision of cultivating lifelong learning mentality and enjoy a lucrative salary scheme. 
 
Requirements & Benefits 
➥ Singaporeans 
➥ Age 25 and above 
➥ Full-time/ Part-time/ Freelance Position 
➥Believes in lifelong learning, and passionate about helping & transforming people's lives 
➥ Seeking highly motivated go-getters with entrepreneurial mindsets 
➥ Attractive salary package for suitable candidates 
➥ Marketing/ Event experience preferred (e.g. real estate, insurance, telesales, etc.) 
Those who are highly motivated but with no Sales or Marketing experience are also welcome. 
 
Contact me if interested. Thanks!
title: WSQ Diploma Course Consultant (Part time/Full time)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Immediate opening available for dishwashers. Experience preferred but not necessary, training will be provided on the job. 
 
Job scope: - 
1. Clearing of plates, bowls, cutleries, etc. 
2. Washing of plates, bowls, cutleries, kitchen utensils, etc. 
3. Stacking and distribution of clean plates, bowls, cutleries, kitchen utensils, etc. 
4. Clearing and disposal of refuse. 
 
Working Hours: - 5 days a week, 12-hour shifts per working day (with rest and meal times). 
 
Remuneration: - S$1,400 per month (fortnightly advance available on request, subject to approval). 
 
Other Benefits - Annual leave, Medical leave, etc. 
 
Location: - Boon Lay (restaurant environment). 
 
Eligibility: - Singapore Citizens, Permanent Residents, Eligible Long-Term Pass Holders. 
 
Interested candidates please reply through Craigslist mailing system, indicating your NAME and CONTACT NUMBER. We will get in touch with you very soon..!! 
 
* Other part-time flexible working hours also available and can be arranged.
title: Dishwashing Crew Wanted (Immediate Vacancies)
